in.definex.Database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.definex.Database.Database
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChatGroupDatabase, ClientDatabase, ScheduleDatabase

    public abstract class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database Abstraction of tables in mysqlite Used to control the version of the tables in mysqlite Static functions should be used to query sqlite.
